name: BomberGhosts
description:
It's bomberman but in a creepy dark setting, with custom power-ups, custom character selection and timed events! Experience Bomberman like never before!

If you do have the time we'd appreciate if you'd fill out this form! https://forms.gle/vMp3WBAV742T4Brh8

Controls:

P1 - Selecting character: A-D, Space to ready up

In-game: WASD, E for bomb

P2 -  Selecting character: Arrow left-right, R. Ctrl to ready up

In-game: Arrow keys, R. Ctrl for bomb

P3-P4: Controller(s) required!

Selecting characters: lt-rt, Select to ready up

In-game: Left joystick to move, A to spawn bomb
